Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Open XML create image from excel range" (#1654) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
### Discussed in https://github.com/dotnet/Open-XML-SDK/discussions/1653
Originally posted by **ppiredda** January 23, 2024 Hi all, sorry but i have this problem: I create an Excel file and after that I need to collect row and columns (range) and create an image in order to send it to the clients. I found SpreadSheetGear and it works but it is very expensive. Is it possibile to do that directly with open xml? Thanks a lot for your collaboration. Help mi please.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Formatting of Images in word document from rich text control is not aligned." (#1652) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi we are using open xml sdk to generate word document. The content into word document is fetched from external resource crm. we are using a word template defined in crm and adding component into the word document from the fetched rich text control source. 

The issue is mainly when the images are between the text words, not when image is after the lines.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "'OpenXmlElementList' does not contain a definition for 'GetItem'" (#1651) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Missing method for getting item from OpenXmlElementList class.

Starting from version: 3.0.0

Working version: 2.20.0

Error	CS1061	'OpenXmlElementList' does not contain a definition for 'GetItem' and no accessible extension method 'GetItem' accepting a first argument of type 'OpenXmlElementList' could be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Bump xunit from 2.6.5 to 2.6.6" (#1650) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
